mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sisitenum AS "sisitenum", a.sidistrict AS "sidistrict", a.sisitename AS "sisitename", a.sipropertyunit AS "sipropertyunit", a.siroomstyle AS "siroomstyle", a.siretain AS "siretain", a.sicmq AS "sicmq", a.sictq AS "sictq", a.sicuq AS "sicuq", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM biz_site_baseinfo a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_site_baseinfo( id, sisitenum, sidistrict, sisitename, sipropertyunit, siroomstyle, siretain, sicmq, sictq, sicuq, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sisitenum}, #{sidistrict}, #{sisitename}, #{sipropertyunit}, #{siroomstyle}, #{siretain}, #{sicmq}, #{sictq}, #{sicuq}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_site_baseinfo SET sisitenum = #{sisitenum}, sidistrict = #{sidistrict}, sisitename = #{sisitename}, sipropertyunit = #{sipropertyunit}, siroomstyle = #{siroomstyle}, siretain = #{siretain}, sicmq = #{sicmq}, sictq = #{sictq}, sicuq = #{sicuq}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
